meanings.meaning: jelly stiff enough to stand alone

vlive.korean: 진짜 아무렇지 않은 척 할 거야. -부숴진 거 아니야? I'll pretend that I'm all right. - Did it break? 듣기 View video KNK : 지금 크나큰(KNK)은?
vlive.english: I'll pretend that I'm all right. - Did it break?

vlive.korean: 제가 머릿결이 너무 안 좋아서 머리가 잘 부숴진 답니다. My hair is pretty damaged, so strands fall out on my brush. 듣기 View video AKMU : 잘준비방송
vlive.english: My hair is pretty damaged, so strands fall out on my brush.

vlive.korean: 아니야 네가 "저거 왜 계속 부숴지는..." No, you were like, "Why does it keep breaking...". 듣기 View video BLACKPINK : 비둘기 모여라🐰
vlive.english: No, you were like, "Why does it keep breaking...".

vlive.korean: 부숴지는 거 아니야? Isn't it something to be broken? 듣기 View video BTS : Run BTS! 2017 - EP.32
vlive.english: Isn't it something to be broken?

vlive.korean: 이렇게 바닥이 부숴졌는데. The floor was broken like this. 듣기 View video PENTAGON : <펜타곤 교과서> 5교시 - 마지막 수업
vlive.english: The floor was broken like this.

examples.korean: The door splintered and left the remains of the lock dangling from the frame. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 문이 산산이 부숴지고, 문틀에 매달려있는 부숴진 열쇠 파편만이 남았다. YBM All in All English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The door splintered and left the remains of the lock dangling from the frame. Add to Wordbook
